pages.text: Blood Scrolls are used to save larger spell chains.  Use these to make crafting Blood Gems less tedious, o bearer mine.  Enscribe Blood Gems on the Scribe's Table, or by holding the scroll in your main hand, with the gems in your off hand.
Any further enscribings add that spell to the end of the enscribed spell, and it's in this way that a mage may ascend beyond the previous limits of their magic.
